title: Dollar Tree hit by third-party data breach impacting 2 million people
description: Discount store chain Dollar Tree was impacted by a third-party data breach affecting 1,977,486 people after the hack of service provider Zeroed-In Technologies. [...]

title: SIM swapper gets 8 years in prison for account hacks, crypto theft
description: Amir Hossein Golshan, 25, was sentenced to eight years in prison by a Los Angeles District Court and ordered to pay $1.2 million in restitution for crimes involving SIM swapping, merchant fraud, support fraud, account hacking, and cryptocurrency theft. [...]

title: Microsoft starts testing new Windows 11 Energy Saver feature
description: Microsoft has started testing a new Windows 11 Energy Saver feature that helps customers extend their portable computers' battery life. [...]

title: Black Basta ransomware made over $100 million from extortion
description: Russia-linked ransomware gang Black Basta has raked in at least $100 million in ransom payments from more than 90 victims since it first surfaced in April 2022, according to joint research from Corvus Insurance and Elliptic. [...]

title: Hackers breach US water facility via exposed Unitronics PLCs
description: CISA (Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency) is warning that threat actors breached a U.S. water facility by hacking into Unitronics programmable logic controllers (PLCs) exposed online. [...]

title: Japanese Space Agency JAXA hacked in summer cyberattack
description: The Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) was hacked in a cyberattack over the summer, potentially compromising sensitive space-related technology and data. [...]

title: US seizes Sinbad crypto mixer used by North Korean Lazarus hackers
description: The U.S. Department of the Treasury has sanctioned the Sinbad cryptocurrency mixing service for its use as a money-laundering tool by the North Korean Lazarus hacking group. [...]

title: How Continuous Pen Testing Protects Web Apps from Emerging Threats
description: The nature and ubiquity of modern web apps make them rife for targeting by hackers. Learn more from Outpost24 about the value of continuous monitoring to secure modern web apps. [...]

title: Okta: October data breach affects all customer support system users
description: Okta's investigation into the breach of its Help Center environment last month revealed that the hackers obtained data belonging to all customer support system users. [...]
